gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 117, Hawks 109
gameRecap.excerpt: Bam Adebayo recorded 26 points, 17 rebounds and four assists for the Heat as they defeat the Hawks, 117-109. Jaime Jaquez Jr. notched a career-high 20 points, along with three rebounds and four assists for the Heat in the victory, while Trae Young (27 points, 11 assists) and Dejounte Murray (23 points, five rebounds, five assists) combined for 50 points for the Hawks in the losing effort. The Heat improve to 5-4 on the season, while the Hawks fall to 5-4.
